page.title: 09The playgroup at Woodlands.
page.content: There is a playgroup at our school.The lady that runs it is a parent at school.She is a playgroup supervisor.She arrives 15 minutes early.The playgroup is held at Woodlands Primary School.The school is right in the middle of the countryside.Across from the school is a forest.There are some houses round about.The children and mothers at the playgroup make new friends.They usually go to the same school too.At playgroup the children make things. They have lots of toys to play with.On fine days they go outside to play. The playgroup go on outings with the children and the school pupils.They take lunches and their mums come too.The toys come from all over the place.Most of them are ordered,such as tractors,prams and other equipment.
